data.title: 211 WNY
data.meta_description: 211 WNY is your free and confidential link to health and human services. Every day, across Western New York, people just like you are looking for help. 211 WNY is here 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Developmental Disabilities. Domestic Abuse. Health and Wellness. Housing. Legal Services. Mental Health. Nutrition.
data.text:
Get Directions »

Send to email »

Send to my phone »

Print »

Update Information »

Call for Action WIVB - TV

2077 Elmwood Avenue Buffalo, NY 14207 www.wivb.com

Main Phone

716-879-4900

Secondary Phone

716-879-4968

Fax

716-879-4889

Primary Services

General Legal Aid, Individual Advocacy

Description

An affiliate of the Call for Action National Network, which handles all kinds of human services problems. Office will make advocacy calls on behalf of clients.

Lawyers Night Phone-in, offered six evenings throughout the calendar year.

Hours

Monday-Friday, 11am-1pm.

Eligibility

Open to all.

Area served: WNY.

Intake Process

Call, use case form on www.wivb.com; letters are also accepted by regular mail to address of record.

Program Fees

Free.

Handicap Accessible?

Yes

Date of Official Change

May 22, 2019

Contacts

Maria Visco (Primary)

Director

call4action@wivb.com

716-879-4968
